title: How to use the Rolodex
description: Below is a quick list of commands to get you started with the Rolodex bot!

fields.name: /rolodex generate
fields.value:
***YOU MUST RUN THIS FIRST***
This will generate a blank rolodex for you to use.

fields.name: /lookup
fields.value: This will look up a user's information in the rolodex.

fields.name: /rolodex set
fields.value: This will let you update your information in the rolodex.

fields.name: /rolodex remove
fields.value: This will let you remove a specific field from your rolodex entry.

fields.name: /rolodex delete
fields.value: This will delete your information from the rolodex.

fields.name: /help
fields.value: This will show you this message.
